title.rendered: NEW Warehouse! + Thinking Putty + Military Toys

content.rendered:
Gottwals Books began in March of 2007 in a 1,500 square foot shop. Since then, we have grown to 4 stores in Middle Georgia, and we now have locations nationwide under the Walls of Books franchise.
Our current headquarters is a beautiful 8,100 square foot office/warehouse building in Byron. But, we’ve needed more room! We recently announced on Facebook that we purchased a 44,000 square foot warehouse in efforts to process even more books, therefore serving more customers all over the USA.
We will post updates during renovations so you can see this property transform into the new Gottwals Books headquarters.
Our goal is to have a combined Grand Opening and 10-Year Anniversary celebration in the Spring of 2017. The building can be seen from I-75 between Byron and Warner Robins. It was once an auto auction facility.
Thank you, everyone, for supporting us. As we just considered the gift of Christ this season, we see this property as a reflection of God’s goodness here at Gottwals Books.

 

Thinking Putty!

Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty is a silicone-based putty that is nontoxic and will never dry out. Inspired by elements from nature, art, science, and math, Thinking Putty is also made in the USA. Now sold at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

25% OFF Military Toys

This awesome deal is still going! Get 25% off military toys featured exclusively at our Warner Robins location.

 

New Year Resolution

Whether your 2017 resolution is to eat healthier, exercise more, budget your money, try something new, or just to read as many books as possible… we have what you need!

 

New Year’s Eve Hours

This year we will close at 4:00 p.m. on New Year’s Eve. We will be closed New Year’s Day, and our regular hours will resume on January 2nd. See you in 2017!
